title: Trouble for insects
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company

description: An entertaining film dedicated to "everyone who tries to make a garden - or even sleep in a garden". The film is an account of some of the work being done by the Entomological Branch of the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation in their battle against insect pests.
